title: Gone Rogue Directly Download
description:
Prepare for the robbery talk to informants, choose the most suitable tools, combine perks and specializations . When darkness falls, you can go on the case. Plan your moves intelligently and look for the right way to penetrate the ingenious security systems. But be careful the city actively reacts to all your actions and doesn’t forgive any mistakes. Alternative Europe of the mid-20th century. Who better than a thief to observe the secret life of this vicious society . Toy Rider
Explore the city streets, find secret rooms and eavesdrop on other people’s conversations . Every house and every corner bears the imprint of a story , revealed through satire and black humor. Choose your style of play the development of your character’s skills depends only on your actions. Unlock over 50 perks and specializations (especially strong game-changing skills) and go from a simple street pickpocket to a real master thief.

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo / AMD Phenom II
